lead_paragraph: World Cup leader Lindsey Vonn damaged her left knee as she crashed out of Saturday's super-G race in Andorra in a heavy fall and was taken off the slope on a sled after receiving medical attention next to the course.

headline.print_headline: Vonn Suffers Knee Injury in Super-G Crash
headline.main: Vonn Suffers Knee Injury in Super-G Crash

snippet: World Cup leader Lindsey Vonn damaged her left knee as she crashed out of Saturday's super-G race in Andorra in a heavy fall and was taken off the slope on a sled after receiving medical attention next to the course....
